description: Try our easy to follow Mini Herb & Cheese Scones recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Herb & Cheese Scones Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a 4cmdiameter cutter, cut out rounds and arrange on tray. Reshape dough scraps and repeat. Brush with milk. Bake for 12 minutes or until golden and risen.
